snippet: CNN Worldwide, suffering poor ratings, is taking a chance on Anthony Bourdain’s cocky persona with a new travel-and-food show.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column observes CNN Worldwide, suffering poor ratings, is taking a chance on chef and author Anthony Bourdain’s cocky persona with a new travel-and-food show to air on weekends; program will debut after his Travel Channel shows end.
lead_paragraph: CNN Worldwide, suffering poor ratings, is taking a chance on Anthony Bourdain’s cocky persona with a new travel-and-food show.

headline.seo: CNN Hires Bourdain, in a Bet on Lifting Stalled Ratings
headline.main: Brash Chef and Big Bet for CNN
headline.print_headline: Brash Chef And Big Bet For CNN
